section.title: Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Operating System Requirements

listitem.para: Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Manager requires Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6.3 or higher. Complete successful installation of the operating system prior to commencing installation of the Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Manager.

Virtualization hosts must run Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Hypervisor 6.3, Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6.3, or a later edition of Red Hat Enterprise Linux. Where Red Hat Enterprise Linux hosts are to be used it is expected that you have completed installation of the operating system prior to commencing installation of the Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Manager.
Installation of the Red Hat Enterprise Linux Hypervisor is, however, covered in this guide. More detailed information is also available in the Red Hat Enterprise Linux - Hypervisor Deployment Guide.
